mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Square Dance Records 1980", "Traveling Square Tappers", "1980 Area Publications Directory", "Red Hot-What?", "Take A Good Look-Formations", "Advanced Feedback", "Callers/Teachers Notebook", and "1980 Scholarship Winners". This edition also includes the regular features entitled "As I See It", "Discovery", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "Contra Corner", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Callers/Teachers Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On the Record", "Current Releases", "Square Dance Date Book", "Fashion Feature", "Publications Profile", and "National Convention".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
